content.about:
About the deal

Vgulp presents a choice of starters on the house, when your liquor bill exceeds 800/- at woodstok (Resto-cafe) Indira Nagar. If you are a great food lover, enjoy your drink, and a choice of starters is absolutely free to delight your experience. woodstok has received an average 4+ ratings by food critics, and we highly recommend it.

The choice of starters include - Chicken wings : 285, Corn salt and pepper : 210, Chacos nachos : 285, Classic corn and cheese patty : 200, Honey chilli potato : 235, Spiced Potato wedges : 210, Chicken mini kieves : 210

The offer is valid on weekdays and weekends. With this awesome offer in woodstok Indira Nagar, the value just got bigger.

  • Offer vaild round the clock, all days including weekends
  • Offer valid on select starters only
  • The Restaurant may get crowded, check in advance to confirm your reservation
  • Present your voucher in email on your phone
  • You must be over the legal drinking age in your city to redeem this voucher against drinks/liquor.
  • Cannot be redeemed with cash
  • Please do not print to waste paper, unless absolutely necessary
